name: Neon Pop Numbers
description:
Neon Pop Numbers is a simply and funny puzzle game:

-When there are more than two adjacent squares with the same number, click on one of the squares and the adjacent blocks will be automatically combined into higher-level blocks.
-2 is synthesized as 4, 4 is synthesized as 8, 8 is synthesized as 16... and reach 2048, and will endless after it.
- When no adjacent numbers can be synthesized, game would be over.

Please enjoy it!
